4. Metadata: Are you collecting any metadata with your measurements, for example OME for microscopy or CXI for XRD?https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.cq8tg2, https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.9h5j8c
7. Lirias is a publication repository and is not suitable for data sharing, you can use KU Leuven RDR instead (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or consider domain specific repositories, f1000 research gives good recommendations https://f1000research.com/for-authors/data-guidelines
You can always contact onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be if you like to learn more about metadata and repositories
